casebody.data:
No. 10-10754. Stacy W. Howard, Petitioner v. William R. Byars, Jr., Director, South Carolina Department of Corrections, et al. 565 U.S. 848, 132 S. Ct. 168,

181 L. Ed. 2d 81,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5980. October 3, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 395 Fed. Appx. 942.
